hymn.title: For unto us a child is born

layout.singingstanza: For un -- to us a child is born, Un -- to us a son is giv -- en; And the gov -- ern -- ment shall be up -- on His shoul -- der; And His name shall be called Won -- der -- ful, Coun -- se -- lor, the migh -- ty God, The ev -- er -- last -- ing Fa -- ther, And the Prince of Peace is He.

lyrics.stanza: For unto us a child is born, Unto us a son is given; And the government shall be upon His shoulder; And His name shall be called Wonderful, Counselor, the mighty God, The everlasting Father, And the Prince of Peace is He.
